function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation systems in refurbishment alternatives leading to poor indoor air quality and high indoor temperatures.","Impact":"Decrease in worker performance and increase in short-term sick leaves due to poor indoor air quality and high indoor temperatures.","Mitigation":"Ensure ventilation systems are properly designed and installed to provide adequate air exchange and temperature control.","Technologies":"HVAC systems with advanced air handling units, air ducts, and exhaust terminals.","People":"Occupants of the refurbished spaces, workers, employees.","Owner":"Architects, engineers, building managers, and HVAC contractors."}]}
